title: Image Class Translation Distance: A Novel Interpretable Feature for Image Classification
details: MK Bowen, JW Wilson - arXiv preprint arXiv:2408.08973, 2024
abstract: We propose a novel application of image translation networks for image classification and demonstrate its potential as a more interpretable alternative to conventional black box classification networks. We train a network to translate …

title: 'Psycholag': a new term to describe the delay between physical and psychological improvement in patients with skin disease
details: A Ahmed, P Mohandas, R Taylor, I Assalman, A Bewley - British Journal of …, 2024
abstract: Treatment of chronic inflammatory skin conditions with systemic therapy has two facets: physical 4 improvement and psychological recovery. The two appear connected, with severe skin disease sometimes 5 (but not always) predicting more …
